object.name: editMessageLiveLocation
object.description: Use this method to edit live location messages. A location can be edited until its live_period expires or editing is explicitly disabled by a call to stopMessageLiveLocation. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit live location messages. A location can be edited until its live_period expires or editing is explicitly disabled by a call to stopMessageLiveLocation. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit live location messages. A location can be edited until its *live_period* expires or editing is explicitly disabled by a call to :class:`aiogram.methods.stop_message_live_location.StopMessageLiveLocation`. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned, otherwise :code:`True` is returned.

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.html_description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.rst_description: Required if *chat_id* and *message_id* are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.name: inline_message_id

annotations.description: The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500
annotations.html_description: The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500
annotations.rst_description: The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500
annotations.name: horizontal_accuracy

annotations.description: Direction in which the user is moving, in degrees. Must be between 1 and 360 if specified.
annotations.html_description: Direction in which the user is moving, in degrees. Must be between 1 and 360 if specified.
annotations.rst_description: Direction in which the user is moving, in degrees. Must be between 1 and 360 if specified.
annotations.name: heading

annotations.description: The maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. Must be between 1 and 100000 if specified.
annotations.html_description: The maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. Must be between 1 and 100000 if specified.
annotations.rst_description: The maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. Must be between 1 and 100000 if specified.
annotations.name: proximity_alert_radius

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for a new inline keyboard.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for a new inline keyboard.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for a new `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_.
